trans-unit.source: Represents the transport-level security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref>.
This class is used by <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> to set the transport-level security settings for a binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication.
The return value can be one of the following enumeration members:
Returns the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType"></xref>.
Setting the property to an undefined value.
Gets or sets the extended protection policy.
The extended protection policy.
Gets or sets the type of client credential to be used for authentication against the proxy.
The return value can be one of the following enumeration members:
Returns the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType"></xref>.
Setting the property to an undefined value.
Gets or sets the authentication realm for digest or basic authentication.
An *authentication realm* is a string that contains at least the name of the host performing the authentication and can additionally indicate the collection of users who might have access.
An example might be "registered_someone@example.com".
The authentication realm is displayed to a user to show which one of several possible user names and passwords can be used.
The authentication realm.
The default value is "".
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
Used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
Used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ExtendedProtectionPolicy"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
Used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
Used by WCF for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
